item.title: New version: biology/gatk version 4.6.0.0
item.description: GATK (Genome Analysis Toolkit) offers a wide variety of tools with a primary focus on variant discovery and genotyping.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/matlab version R2023b
item.description: MATLAB is a multi-paradigm numerical computing environment and proprietary programming language developed by MathWorks.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-pyspark version 3.2.1_py312
item.description: Launching and controlling spark on HPC clusters

item.description: Launching and controlling spark on HPC clusters
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libtool version 2.4.7
item.description: GNU Libtool is a generic library support script that hides the complexity of using shared libraries behind a consistent, portable interface.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/gurobi version 11.0.2
item.description: The Gurobi Optimizer is a commercial optimization solver for mathematical programming.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/longshot version 1.0.0
item.description: Longshot is a variant calling tool for diploid genomes using long error prone reads.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/gh version 2.49.2
item.description: gh is GitHub on the command line. It brings pull requests, issues, and other GitHub concepts to the terminal next to where you are already working with git and your code.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/git version 2.45.1
item.description: Git is a free and open source distributed version control system designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with speed and efficiency.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/webkitgtk version 2.28.4
item.description: WebKitGTK is a full-featured port of the WebKit rendering engine, suitable for projects requiring any kind of web integration, from hybrid HTML/CSS applications to full-fledged web browsers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/unifdef version 2.12
item.description: The unifdef utility selectively processes conditional C preprocessor #if and #ifdef directives.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/cellranger-atac version 2.1.0
item.description: Cell Ranger ATAC is a set of analysis pipelines that process Chromium Single Cell ATAC data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-tensorrt version 10.0.1_py312
item.description: Python bindings for the TensorRT library.
